name: Group 3 BigC: Treatment Troopers (asterreeve)
description:
Explore various cancer treatment methods by traveling through the procedurally generated circulatory system and interacting with your body's cells!

Credits:

Developed by - Rhys Anthony, Max Hudson, Aster Reeve

Concept Art by - Joel Tippett, Artie Kirby, Max Parkinson, James Hayball

Assets by - Megan Griib, Domnik Coles, Dylan Fyfe
